responses.rationale: The segment describes a safety measure using neutral, factual language ('kills'). It lacks high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment describes a characteristic of the virus using neutral verbs ('adapted', 'builds up'). It lacks high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment describes an action taken ('ordered', 'used', 'protect') using neutral language. It lacks high-potency verbs or metaphors.
